title: Reseller Hosting
shortDescription: Dedicated support with easy-to-use and worry-free reseller hosting

packages.productDescription: A great package to launch your hosting business by hosting your client websites.

features.toolTip: false

Our servers are equipped with high-performance, Non-Volatile Memory Express (NVMe) for both files and databases, ensuring lightning-fast loading times for your sites. The storage is allocated per plan, meaning that if you have multiple sites, it will be shared among them.

The offer for a free domain is available only for hosting plans that are valid for a year or longer. If you choose a longer-term plan, you will need to pay for the additional registration term at the prevailing rate. This offer cannot be used with any other discount or promotion. Additionally, the free domain is only available for the first year of the hosting plan, and afterwards, the domain will renew at the then-current renewal price.
